mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, reply, replyer, replydate) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, now())
insert into tbl_reply (bno, reply, replyer, parent, replydate) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{parent}, now())
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, deleted = #{deleted}, updatedate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select reply.parent, reply.bno, reply.rno, reply.replyer, reply.replydate, reply.reply, reply.deleted, memb.photo from tbl_reply reply left join tbl_member memb on reply.replyer = memb.userid where reply.bno = #{bno} order by ifnull(parent,rno) desc, replydate limit 0, 10
select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
